title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Jan 8 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Jan 8 2022
description:
Infuriating! Biden silent as Chicago teachers refuse to work. Kids, schools and covid, Clay says, represents, "the biggest failure of American public policy in our lives." Psaki lies, blames unvaccinated for school closures. Clay's play: Go to Chicago on January 6th, President Trump, and have everyone focus on the now, not one year ago. Manhattan's new woke DA says he won't prosecute most crimes. Criminals know this too and will commit more crimes. Double vaxxed, boosted and locked down at Yale. Princeton students can't leave the county, except for extraordinary reasons!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
